name: vancas
description: A basic `canvas` game and a corresponding editor.

scripts.gh-pages: git checkout -b gh-pages || git checkout gh-pages && git checkout master -- . && tsc && rm -rf src .gitignore tsconfig.json package.json README.md && echo '.DS_Store' > .gitignore && git add -u && git add -- built img && (git commit -m 'Regenerate gh-pages' || true) && git checkout master
